arr.title: Monster book of monsters
arr.author: Edwardus Lima
arr.description: A vicious guide to monstrous creatures

arr.title: Advanced Potion-Making
arr.author: Libatius Borage
arr.description: is a Potions textbook used by Hogwarts for N.E.W.T level Potions classes

arr.title: Quidditch Through the Ages
arr.author: Kennilworthy Whisp
arr.description: A guid to quidditch through the ages written by a quidditch expert

arr.title: Dragon Breeding for Pleasure and Profit
arr.author: Unknown
arr.description: Tried and tested tips to help you breed dragons, including the old-time favourite of brandy and chicken blood every half hour for newly-hatched chicks.

arr.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
arr.author: Newt Scamander
arr.description: I have visited lairs, burrows and nests across five continents, observed the curious habits of magical beasts in a hundred countries, witnessed their powers, gained their trust and, on occasion, beaten them off with my travelling kettle.

arr.title: Guide to Advanced Transfiguration
arr.author: Unknown
arr.description: is a textbook used by sixth and seventh year students of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, it was a N.E.W.T.-level textbook, used for advanced study in the subject of Transfiguration.

arr.title: Handbook of Do-It-Yourself Broom Care
arr.author: Unknown
arr.description: is a guide to taking care of your broomstick.

arr.title: One Thousand Magical Herbs and Fungi
arr.author: Phyllida Spore
arr.description: A comprehensive botanical A-Z of magical herbs and fungi for easy plant identification and application

arr.title: Year With The Yeti
arr.author: Gilderoy Lockhart
arr.description: Another instalment of adventure from Gilderoy Lockhart

arr.title: The Dark Forces: A Guide to Self Protection
arr.author: Quentin Trimble
arr.description: This book gives an excellent grounding in magical self-defence
